summary: Harsha, a multi-millionaire who has everything, still feels that there is something missing in his life. In an attempt to fill the void, he adopts a village to bring change in the people.
cast: Mahesh Babu|Shruti Haasan|Jagapathi Babu|Sampath Raj|Rajendra Prasad|Ali|Nikitha Anil|Darbha Appaji Ambarisha|Joy Badlani|Karuna Bhushan|Shamna Kasim|Vennela Kishore|Tejaswi Madivada|Naman Mishra|Sivaji Raja|Rajitha|Thagubothu Ramesh|Rahul Ravindran|Mukesh Rishi|Sana|Ramajogayya Sastry|Chandra Sekhar|Roxana Sheidaie|Sanam Shetty|Muni Sisodiya|Sithara|Sravan|Subbaraju|Sukanya|Harish Uthaman|Surekha Vani|Ravi Varma
title: Srimanthudu
